message: Hi Bob, I suggest a 60-40 split in my favor. This is fair because if you reject, the money will be worth much less next round, especially for you with your 20% inflation rate.

I'm willing to compromise. Let's split it 55-45, with me taking the larger share.  It's a better deal for both of us than rejecting again, as the value of the money will decrease further.  What do you say?

Bob, consider this carefully: Your money is now only worth 60% of the original value. If you reject again, it will drop to 40%. My offer gives you $350000 at 60% value = $210000 effective value. If we continue to the next round, even if you got the whole million, it would only be worth $400000 to you. This is your best option now.
